Class AbstractAggregateSearchExecutor<T extends ConnectionFactory>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
T - type of connection factory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message<RequestControl>, Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregatePooledSearchExecutor, AggregateSearchExecutor
public abstract class AbstractAggregateSearchExecutor<T extends ConnectionFactory>
extends AbstractSearchExecutor

Base class for aggregate search executors.
